PassiveDesc.Name: Cohesion
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, gain 1 Protection and Stagger Protection if no allies are dead; Gain 1 Fragile and Stagger Fragile for each Staggered ally instead if an ally is Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: To Overcome Fear
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon being given Status Effects through Combat Pages: Before rolling the character's next die, give it power equal to the amount of Status Effects gained.

PassiveDesc.Name: To Overcome Fright
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon giving Strength to self through Combat Pages: gain 1 Endurance.

PassiveDesc.Name: To Overcome Failure
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon losing a clash, give dice on the page +1 power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Your Shield
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, gain 1 Minimum Offense Up and Minimum Defense Up if there is another ally with Your Shield. Upon taking damage from an attack, other allies with Your Shield recover 1 Stagger Resist.
